child1.question: Q. Discuss whether formation of new states in recent times is beneficial or not for the economy of India?

child2.question: Q. Has the formation of linguistic states strengthened the cause of Indian unity?

child3.question: Q. Write a critical note on the evolution and significance of the slogan, ‘Jai Jawan Jai Kisan’.

child4.question: Q. Discuss the contributions of Maulana Abul Kalam Azad to pre- and post-independent India.

child5.question: Q. Analyze the circumstances that led to the Tashkent Agreement in 1966. Discuss the highlights of the Agreement.

child6.question: Q. Critically examine the compulsions which prompted India to play a decisive role in the emergence of Bangladesh.
